item.title: Item picking up?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

I decided i was going to get a little bit clever with myself for once and attempt to make ava’s accumulator pickup steel arrows at a set interval, i made an int and set it to 10000 and then i added this to my client.java

if(wearID == 14591) { if (avaTimer <= 0) { addItem(886, 1); avaTimer = 10000; misc.println("adding steel arrow to user"); } }
I dont know if this will work or not, im too lazy to wait for the timer to hit 0 but the compiler didnt throw up any errors. Could anyone verify if thsi WOULd work or not.

-thanks!

Read full topic
